channel.title: [RP] Turn Based Shu Shu Wars - {Applications}
channel.description:
More stats. Less taxing.
Shurian is not amused.
The First Round starts upon 4 sign ups. Backstories not required. Though, backstories can help host prep skills that are appropriate to your character.
> # Name > **Level:** 1 **Class:** ?? **Range:** Melee/Ranged (1/2) **Skills:** {To be decided by host} **Trait:** {To be **discussed** with host} **Stats:** {Will be given to you in your chat}
StAtS? How does that work?
Think of it as the point buy system in DnD.
Stats can be allocated into these...
ATK/INT/DEX/DEF/MDF/SKL. Mechanics will be displayed in due time. However, note. This is a turn based game.
Also... Pick your Poison [poll type=regular results=always] * PvE (Coop) * PvP (Coop in Teams... if there's enough people.) [/poll]
[quote="Magnus, post:2, topic:79093, full:true"] ThIs ReMiNds Me Of SoMeThInG [/quote]
Maybe... this? ![163-1630097_lucina-fire-emblem-emotes|610x500](upload://g8tmTpgQjUIy3Xa4380NoJrJu78.jpeg)
To indicate a join... just do a **/in** or **/join** or... whatever you want! Just ping me along with it! :3 Shu shu is Shu shu. And Shu shu has list of people who joined!
**Entering the Fray** 1. @Magnus 2. @Emilia 3. @Soulshade55r 4. @Simon 5. @GamerPoke 6. @Ami 7. @Reaper 8. @SirDerpsAlot

item.title: [RP] Turn Based Shu Shu Wars - {Applications}
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
More Mechanics

  1. Each Player can Act once per turn.
  2. An Act consists of Movement, Action and Resolution phases.
  3. Movement phase is straightforward, Action phase allows any interaction with any item on the map, entering Combat or any skills used. Resolution refers to any effects that the Action may have caused and resultants thereof.
  4. Status Ailments are present.
  5. Sight: If no allies are in direct Line of Sight with the enemy, the enemy will not appear in view. This applies to the enemy. Move with caution.
  6. Map Events: May Trigger and Change the map accordingly. Players can change the landscape as well, but that will depend on the map and what action the player can reasonably make.
  7. Bosses: Will be marked on the map accordingly.
  8. Enemy Turn: If the enemy moves, you will hear shuffling in a set direction. The host will tell you where the enemy is coming from, but if you can’t see them, you will not see them on the map.

Combat

  1. The Attacker will always Attack First, unless Passives state otherwise.
  2. The Attacker will attack a fixed amount of damage only changeable by any critical that it manages to land.
  3. If the Defender still lives after an attack, it will Counter unless passives state otherwise.
  4. After this Counter, if any party’s speed is above the enemy’s by at least 4 points, the faster party will attack again.
  5. Finally, Resolve any End of Round effects from passives.

Information in Round

  1. Enemies will be seen like this.

Swordsman

HP: ??/??
W: ??

  1. Hit them once, or twice to get their full details. You won’t know how hard they hit. You can also Analyse as an Action. An example of a filled sheet is…

Swordsman

HP 9/9
W: Bronze Sword / A: Leather Suit
ATK: 4 (+1)
DEF: 3 (+1)
RES: 2

Note: Speed is not stated. But you can infer from their equipments.

Read full topic

item.title: [RP] Turn Based Shu Shu Wars - {Applications}
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Since there aren’t a lot of healer classes…
I will assign one healer to all teams…

But, they’ll always follow the following rules in the following order.

  1. They will heal any unit in range, given that they are critically injured. (<50% HP)
  2. They will use aoe heals if the party is grouped up together and have 2 or more units being critically injured.
  3. They will use offense buffs on the most offense oriented character.
  4. They will use defense buffs on the most defense oriented character
  5. They will move the full space of their movement capabilities.

Read full topic
